div.bibl: Interview, with Mr. David J. Jones, 6101 North Washtenaw Avenue, Chicago, Illinois, by Stephen O. Davies.

body.p: Dr. David J. Jones, Chicago city physician, had his own private practice from 1911 to 1923. Appointed city physician in 1923 and was such until 1927; from 1927 to 1933 again private practice. 1933 to 1936 City of Chicago physician, - Congregational Church â€“ has had all branches of Masonry (32 degree Shriner).
Office: Room 111, City Hall, Chicago, Illinois.
